name: José R. A. Torreão
content: Prof. José Ricardo Torreão Professor José R. A. Torreão Education: B.Sc. Physics, 1980, Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE), Brazil M.Sc. Physics, 1983, Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE), Brazil Dissertation Subject: Nuclear Physics Ph.D. Physics, 1989, Brown University, USA Thesis Subject: Artificial Vision Research Interests: Artificial and Natural Vision Recent Projects: · 3D shape estimation · Computational modeling of cortical neurons · Motion synthesis Some recent publications: · "Generalized Signal-Tuned Approach for Signal Representation and Analysis" José R.A. Torreão International Journal of Modern Physics C, 1750001, 2016 · "Holonomy, Quantum Mechanics, and the Signal-Tuned Approach to the Striate Cortex" José R.A. Torreão International Journal of Modern Physics C 27(8), 1650089, 2016 · "Equation of Motion and General Solution for the One-Dimensional Complex Cell Response in the Signal-Tuned Approach" José R.A. Torreão Biological Cybernetics 109, pp. 435-452, 2015 · "Signal-Tuned Gabor Functions as Models for Stimulus-Dependent Cortical Receptive Fields" José R.A. Torreão, Silvia M.C. Victer, Marcos S. Amaral Neural Computation 26(5), pp. 920-952, 2014 · "A Signal-Tuned Gabor Transform with Application to EEG Analysis" José R.A. Torreão, Silvia M.C. Victer, João L. Fernandes International Journal of Modern Physics C, 24(4), 1350017, 2013 · "Motion Blur and Deblur through Green’s functions" Perfilino E. Ferreira Júnior and José R.A. Torreão In: ‘Computer Graphics’, Nobuhiko Mukai (Editor) In-Tech, Croatia, pp.179-194, 2012 · "Towards a Biologically Plausible Stereo Approach" José R.A. Torreão and Silvia M.C. Victer In: ‘Advances in Stereo Vision’, José R.A. Torreão (Editor) In-Tech, Croatia, pp.57-70, 2011 · "Linear-nonlinear neuronal model for shape from shading" José R.A. Torreão and João L. Fernandes Pattern Recognition Letters 32, pp. 1223-1239, 2011 · "Shape from shading through photometric motion" João L. Fernandes and José R.A. Torreão Pattern Analysis and Applications 13, pp. 35-58, 2010 · "A comparative analysis of  Green’s function of 1D matching equations for motion synthesis" Perfilino E. Ferreira Júnior, José R.A. Torreão and Paulo.C.P. Carvalho Pattern Recognition Letters 30, pp. 1321-1334, 2009 · "Motion synthesis through 1D affine matching" Perfilino E. Ferreira Júnior, José R.A. Torreão, Paulo.C.P. Carvalho and Marcelo B. Vieira Pattern Analysis and Applications 11, pp. 45-58, 2008 · "A novel approach to photometric motion" José R.A. Torreão, João L. Fernandes and Helena C.G. Leitão Image and Vision Computing 27, pp. 126-135, 2007 · "Disparity estimation through Green’s functions of matching equations" José R.A. Torreão Biological Cybernetics 97, pp. 307-316, 2007 · "Green’s functions of matching equations: a unifying approach for low-level vision problems" José R.A. Torreão, João L. Fernandes, Marcos S. Amaral and Leonardo Beltrão In: ‘Vision Systems’, Goro Obinata and Ashishi Dutta (Eds.)
